alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Harper; Kingman; Lincoln; McPherson; Reno; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 2:46PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER. THIS IS A POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS SITUATION FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 033...048...049...050...051... 067...082 AND 091... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Red Flag Warning for extreme grassland fire danger. This is a potentially dangerous situation, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM CDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Winds...South 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 17 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
